name: Figit - Auto Layout UI Components
description:
Figit makes it easier to create production ready designs in record time with the help of Auto Layout. The plugin is a library of over 1000 UI elements in Auto Layout from three different Categories of Web Application, Ecommerce and Marketing UI Kits.


Blueprints:

The Low-Fidelity Blueprints can be used as a base to achieve finalised designs faster. There is no need to reinvent the wheel. Blueprints are abstract UI patterns that can be used to any design pattern. Use your design system to modify the blueprints to your requirements.


Hi-Fidelity UI Elements:

Hi-Fi components follow a standard design system. You can use these to craft landing pages, dashboards and other quick concepts.


These elements can be easily dropped in your design files with just a single click. Fast track your workflow with production ready designs and forget about starting from scratch again.


How to use:

  1. Open the Plugin
  2. You can start with a Blueprint or just go directly for the High Fidelity UI Kit Designs
  3. Search for your desired section such as `Hero`
  4. Search for the Design that matches your vision
  5. Drag and Drop the element to add it to your File
  6. Tweak it according to your preferences
  7. Done
